summary: This mod adds a new armor and weapons with sounds
descriptionHtml:
WARING THESE ITEMS ARE SPOILERS TO THE GAME 
THEY ARE EXPERIMENTAL ITEMS THAT WILL BE ADDED 
TO A WHOLE NEW ADD-ON TO THE GAME

reading this info is easy
ITEM: MATERIAL

 
New Armors include

Guardians Chest-plate: Dragonbone
Guardians Boots: Dragonbone
Guardians Shield: Dragonbone
Guardians Gauntlets: Dragonbone
Guardians Hood: Cloth, MISC

The hood is in the Misc tab of the crafting table the rest is in the Dragon tab

New Weapons include.
(ALL THESE WEAPONS HAVE NEW SOUNDS TO THEM SUCH AS A DRAGON ROAR WHEN IT IS DRAWN AND MUCH MORE)

Guardians Bow: Ebony
Guardians Sword: Ebony
THE UNHOLY SPAWN: Daedric
THE UNHOLY DEMON: Daedric

The Guardians weapons are in the Ebony Tab and THE UNHOLY's are in the Daedra tab

There are three new spells as well very op only experimenting with these for future use comment are welcome.
The spells can be bought in the general goods shop of Whiterun not to expensive but very VERY VERY VERY OP,OP OMG THEY ARE OP

New spells include

Guardians Spell of Fire: A super beefed up version of Flames
Guardians Spell of Lighting: A super beefed up version of Sparks
Guardians Shout: A spell casting Shout that will make you learn why being shouts are fun

Please leave comments and suggestions
or email comments and suggestions
me at walshking91@gmail.com

WARNING ALL ITEMS ARE EXPERIMENTAL AND REALLY OVERPOWERED
UPDATED VERSIONS WILL BE RELEASED AS NEEDED  AND A NEW ADD_ON 
TO THE MOD WITH A SMALL DEMO TO THE FULL WILL BE RELEASED
WITH IN A MONTH SO KEEP A EYE OUT CAUSE THINGS IN THIS MOD 
[b][size=4]WILL[/size][/b]              [b][size=5]GET[/size][/b]                  [b][i][u][size=6]BIG[/size][/u][/i][/b]
author: MudCommander95
